title: President Putin declares martial law in four regions of Ukraine
description: Russian forces start evacuating thousands of civilians from the occupied city of Kherson. Also: crowds welcome returning Iranian climber and a new study says little sleep can cause illness.
itunes:subtitle: Russian forces start evacuating thousands of civilians from occupied city of Kherson
itunes:summary: Russian forces start evacuating thousands of civilians from the occupied city of Kherson. Also: crowds welcome returning Iranian climber and a new study says little sleep can cause illness.
itunes:author: BBC World Service
